lines.text: Whene'er the branch shaped like a snake is pointing up, for goodness sake...
Run away!
Go and hide!
The Boogeyman will be inside! Whene'er the branch is pointing down, the Boogeyman has gone to town!
Have you found the Levitating Albino Warthog?
No, but I know where to find a pumpkinificating goose.
Where?
Check the nearest looking glass.
You are far from life. And love. And hope. You are surrounded by dust, and it is dust that you shall become.
Tell me about your father, Rosella.

[talking about a coffin]
Do you promise you won't close the lid?
Of course. I won't bury you, either.
Jeez, Hogarth! You nearly got yourself fried!
Aw, I'm not scared of that old fairy. I could break her in half like a twig.
Well that's good, because she's standing right behind you!
[Hogarth dives under the mud in terror, and Blotar laughs hysterically]
That was not funny, Blotar!
Excuse me, sir. I was wondering...
Well wonder no longer! I am da troll of yer dreams!
Hey lady, got any fava beans?
[after retrieving the "moon", Valanice is arrested and put on trial]
Members of the jury, what is your verdict?
On the charge of moon theft, we find her...
Guilty!
On the charge of impersonating a Falderalian, we find her...
Guilty!
On the charges of party crashing, sneaking, spying and appearing in public without fur, feather or scales, we find her...
Guilty! Guilty! Guilty!
you must spend the rest of your life in the jellybean mines in the faraway kingdom of Wudda-Wudda Boing-Boing!
What? I never heard of such a place! You just made that up, didn't you?
So I did... so I did... does anyone have an idea for her sentence?
Banish her to the plains of the picturesque possums!
Maroon her on the island of ill-natured iguanas!
Make her count every grain of bird seed in the land!
Make her put the moon back at the sky!
Ohhhhhh...
The people have spoken! You have until sunset to put the moon back in its rightful place in the sky, Valanice. If you do not, you will be fed to a 300 pound hamster in the morning!
Yes!
